title: SUYUG’s UFO Campaign Takes Bengaluru By Storm, Redefines Real Estate Marketing
description: SUYUG Infra created a citywide sensation in Bengaluru with its UFO-themed storytelling campaign, generating over 4 million views and redefining real estate marketing through mystery, humour and immersive public engagement, according to MD Yathish Surineni.

title: Trump 'authorizes' release of UFO evidence from secret alien bases
description: Trump backs Congressman Burlison to access secret UFO sites, raising hopes of uncovering proof of alien life and government cover-ups.

title: NASA UFO Cover-up Claims Explode as 'Snake-Like Creatures' Allegedly Spotted by Shuttle Pilot
description: Viral claims of a NASA UFO cover up resurface after a physicist cites astronaut sightings, strange space objects and Gemini mission stories.

title: This day in history: A 'UFO cult' was looking for members to take to the 'next level' in Spokane - Fri, 06 Feb 2026 PST
description: From 1976: Robin and Benji, two leaders of a “UFO Cult,” arrived in Spokane to “reaffirm a message brought by Jesus.”

title: UFO sighting or just three orbs? US military drone video resurfaces showing mysterious glowing objects in triangular formation
description: Newly resurfaced footage from a 2012 US Air Force Reaper drone captures three glowing orbs in a triangular formation over the Persian Gulf. The US Department of Defense classified the event as a UAP, storing it in an archive for "non-human" phenomena.
